title: Analysis of f from sign chart

content.question: Let f be a function that is even and continuous on the closed interval [−3,3]. The function f and its derivatives have the properties indicated in the table below. (a) Find the x-coordinate of each point at which f attains an absolute maximum value or an absolute minimum value. For each x-coordinate you give, state whether f attains an absolute maximum or an absolute minimum.

frqParts.text: Let f be a function that is even and continuous on the closed interval [−3,3]. The function f and its derivatives have the properties indicated in the table below. (a) Find the x-coordinate of each point at which f attains an absolute maximum value or an absolute minimum value. For each x-coordinate you give, state whether f attains an absolute maximum or an absolute minimum.
(b) Find the x-coordinate of each point of inflection on the graph of f. Justify your answer.
(c) In the xy-plane provided below, sketch the graph of a function with all the given characteristics of f.

topic.text: 5.4: Using the First Derivative Test to Determine Relative (Local) Extrema

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
